newsitem.title: UK: New AEI/Caterpillar freight contract under.
newsitem.headline: New AEI/Caterpillar freight contract under.

text.p: Phasing in of a contract signed on April 1 between Caterpillar Inc and global freight forwarder AEI Corp is well underway and the process will continue until the end of the year, AEI said in a statement.
It added that U.S.-based AEI will manage the flow of goods and information supporting the operations of heavy construction and mining equipment manufacturer Caterpillar's operations in 100 countries.
The statement said this is the first time one partner would oversee Caterpillar's global air and ocean freight forwarding, customs brokerage, ground delivery and information management activities.
No estimated value of the contract was given.

AEI said that in addition, its proprietary logistics information system, LOGIS, would manage the worldwide flow of information supporting the movement of Caterpillar products, parts and manufacturing material.
AEI added that Caterpillar had used it as an air freight forwarder since 1957 and is AEI's oldest continuous customer. --Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax +5017
